author: Tony Robbins
message: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals that is, goals that do not inspire them.
title: Thought of the day

author: Eckhart Tolle
message: You do not become good by trying to be good, but by finding the goodness that is already within you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marcus Aurelius
message: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Barrymore
message: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
title: Thought of the day
